mapper.sql: SELECT A.ORG_CD as orgCd , A.MENU_CD as menuCd , A.PAR_MENU_CD as parMenuCd , A.MENU_TYPE as menuType , A.MENU_NM as menuNm , A.MENU_LVL as menuLvl , A.MENU_ODR as menuOdr , A.MENU_URL as menuUrl , A.MENU_PATH as menuPath , A.MENU_DESC as menuDesc , A.USE_YN as useYn , A.TOP_MENU_YN as topMenuYn , A.TOP_MENU_IMG as otpMenuImg , A.LEFT_MENU_IMG as leftMenuImg , A.LEFT_MENU_TITLE as leftMenuTitle , A.MENU_TITLE as menuTitle , A.OPTN_CTGR_CD_1 as optnCtgrCd1 , A.OPTN_CD_1 as optnCd1 , A.OPTN_CTGR_CD_2 as optnCtgrCd2 , A.OPTN_CD_2 as optnCd2 , A.OPTN_CTGR_CD_3 as optnCtgrCd3 , A.OPTN_CD_3 as optnCd3 , A.OPTN_CTGR_CD_4 as optnCtgrCd4 , A.OPTN_CD_4 as optnCd4 , A.OPTN_CTGR_CD_5 as optnCtgrCd5 , A.OPTN_CD_5 as optnCd5 , A.SSL_YN as sslYn , A.DIV_LINE_USE_YN as divLineUseYn , A.CHRG_PRSN_INFO_1 as chrgPrsnInfo1 , A.CHRG_PRSN_INFO_2 as chrgPrsnInfo2 , A.CHRG_PRSN_INFO_3 as chrgPrsnInfo3 , A.DFLT_YN as dfltYn , A.MENU_VIEW_YN as menuViewYn , A.REG_NO as regNo , A.REG_DTTM as regDttm , A.MOD_NO as modNo , A.MOD_DTTM as modDttm , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_org_menu WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD AND MENU_TYPE = A.MENU_TYPE AND PAR_MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD ) AS subCnt , NVL( (SELECT VIEW_AUTH FROM tb_org_auth_grp_menu WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD AND MENU_TYPE = A.MENU_TYPE AND AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd} AND MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD ),'N') AS viewAuth , NVL( (SELECT CRE_AUTH FROM tb_org_auth_grp_menu WHERE ORG_CD = A.ORG_CD AND MENU_TYPE = A.MENU_TYPE AND AUTH_GRP_CD = #{authGrpCd} AND MENU_CD = A.MENU_CD ),'N') AS creAuth FROM tb_org_menu A WHERE A.ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
mapper.select: /* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 기관 메뉴의 전체 목록 */

/* SQL ID : selectAuthorizeByMenu 설 명 : 메뉴 코드 및 사용자 권한으로 메뉴의 권한 */ SELECT MENU_CD as menuCd , MAX(VIEW_AUTH) AS viewAuth , MAX(CRE_AUTH) AS creAuth FROM tb_org_auth_grp_menu WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd} AND MENU_TYPE = NVL((#{menuType}), MENU_TYPE) AND MENU_CD = #{menuCd} AND #{authGrpCd} like CONCAT('%',AUTH_GRP_CD,'%') GROUP BY MENU_CD

/* SQL ID : selectAuthorizeByMenu 설 명 : 메뉴 코드 및 사용자 권한으로 메뉴의 권한 */ SELECT MENU_CD as menuCd , MAX(VIEW_AUTH) AS viewAuth , MAX(CRE_AUTH) AS creAuth FROM tb_sys_auth_grp_menu WHERE MENU_CD = #{menuCd} GROUP BY MENU_CD
/* SQL ID : selectKey 설 명 : 메뉴 코드의 키 생성 */ SELECT CONCAT('MC',LPAD(nextval('SQ_ORG_MENU'), 8, '0'))
mapper.insert: /* SQL ID : insertInit 설 명 : 기관 메뉴의 초기화 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_org_menu ( ORG_CD , MENU_CD , PAR_MENU_CD , MENU_TYPE , MENU_NM , MENU_LVL , MENU_ODR , MENU_URL , MENU_PATH , MENU_DESC , USE_YN , TOP_MENU_YN , TOP_MENU_IMG , LEFT_MENU_IMG , LEFT_MENU_TITLE , MENU_TITLE , OPTN_CTGR_CD_1 , OPTN_CD_1 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_2 , OPTN_CD_2 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_3 , OPTN_CD_3 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_4 , OPTN_CD_4 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_5 , OPTN_CD_5 , SSL_YN , DIV_LINE_USE_YN , DFLT_YN , MENU_VIEW_YN , REG_NO , REG_DTTM , MOD_NO , MOD_DTTM ) SELECT #{orgCd} , MENU_CD , PAR_MENU_CD , MENU_TYPE , MENU_NM , MENU_LVL , MENU_ODR , MENU_URL , MENU_PATH , MENU_DESC , USE_YN , TOP_MENU_YN , TOP_MENU_IMG , LEFT_MENU_IMG , LEFT_MENU_TITLE , MENU_TITLE , OPTN_CTGR_CD_1 , OPTN_CD_1 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_2 , OPTN_CD_2 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_3 , OPTN_CD_3 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_4 , OPTN_CD_4 , OPTN_CTGR_CD_5 , OPTN_CD_5 , SSL_YN , DIV_LINE_USE_YN , 'Y' , 'Y' , #{regNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , #{modNo} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM tb_sys_menu WHERE MENU_TYPE = #{menuType} ORDER BY MENU_LVL ASC
